text:
OFFICE OF THE PRINCIPAL
JACOX JUNIOR HIGH SCHOOL
NORFOLK. 4. VIROINIA
May 31. 1957
MISS MARGARET L. GORDON
PRINCIPAL
ALBERT P. PRESTON
ASST. PRINCIPAL
Mrs. Judith B. Gans, Secretary
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mrs. Gans:
Thank you for your letter of May 22. I have already-
returned the postal card requesting the Fact Sheets and
placing my $2.50 order for a year's subscription.
In your letter you mentioned that you were enclosing
some material that you thought would be of interest to me.
Unfortunately the materials were not enclosed as you
intended.
Please, if it is not too much trouble to you, send me
the materials to which you made reference.
Thank you very much.
Sincerely yours.
M. L. Gordon
Principal
MLG/b
